summary: Adds a standalone craftable armor based on Tsun's cuirass.
descriptionHtml:
This mod adds a craftable armor to the Daedric section (no perk needed). It's basically a standalone retexture of Tsun's armor and comes with a custom normalmap as well. I named it "Unholy" because I tried to make it as Oblivion-themed as possible. The cuirass itself has an armor rating resembling that of the Ebony Armor, but it weighs less.

This mod is intended for those who are playing my Xivilai Race mod, as well as others. :)

Bodies supported:
-Vanilla male (I had trouble pasting the armor piece to body replacers in NifSkope because they lacked the neck-node or something) Although it should work with most male body replacers since they all share almost the same UV-maps.
-UNP (might make a conversion for CBBE later on)

Would be glad to hear some ideas as well as constructive critique in order to improve this mod!

Credit goes to:
-AlienSlof for the collar mesh and textures.
-GendunDrup for the letters on the bracelets.
-ReflexShooter for the UNP conversion of the Tsun armor.
I would also like to thank lagrie since I got inspired by their screenshot of their "Daedric Barbarian/ Xivilai Armor" that was sadly never finished due to crashing issues.

Screenshots welcome!
author: T3alrose
